Network - general

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Changes to what is displayed in lobby when a player has kick votes.

PC Specific Changes
General
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Added support for Xinput wheel and Logitech Rumblepad 2, including default action map configurations.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Adding ability to use H-pattern shifter in custom configuration by allowing configuration of gears 1 to 6 and reverse. Same for boost.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Fix for missing Force feedback on Vista.
ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢ Added the ability to override the controller type, so that if the game fails to auto-detect it, users can specify it themselves.
